content.html: Tip for social media cards on Twitter: if Twitter has cached a URL without a social media card and you later add one, you can reset Twitter's global cache (as far as I can tell) by running the URL through their card validator tool cards-dev.twitter.com/validator
content.value: Tip for social media cards on Twitter: if Twitter has cached a URL without a social media card and you later add one, you can reset Twitter's global cache (as far as I can tell) by running the URL through their card validator tool cards-dev.twitter.com/validator
